name: Repeat.
description:
Follow us on Twitter @MacDocBros

This is a game made by two teenagers during the summer holidays. It was made using Unity 3D, Pixen, Pixelmator, Logic Pro X and Bfxr. This game consists of 816 lines of code.

How to Play: Enter the arena, fight waves of enemies and try to survive as long as you can. There is an easter egg in this game, so try to find it.

Our high score is 13, try to beat it.
